lead_paragraph: Sailors with an eye on the finish line in Havana set off from Miami, kicking off the inaugural yacht race on the route amid warming ties between Cuba and the United States.
snippet: Sailors with an eye on the finish line in Havana set off from Miami, kicking off the inaugural yacht race on the route amid warming ties between Cuba and the United States.
abstract: Inaugural Miami to Havana Race begins with 46 boats participating in 210-mile event.
